description:
Akane, Aiko, and Mio goes to the pool. / Syuko can`t swim? / Syoko is asked to clean the pool.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Heated Warm Up! / It`s a Special Training / Bling Bling! Cleaning the Pool
Nekketsu Junbiundou! / Tokkun Nanda yo nee / Pool Souji de Kirakira ni
熱血準備運動! / 特訓なんだよねー / プール掃除でキラキラに
